Subject: Applying for sick leave - July 6th & 7th
EmailText:
Hi Shahid, 
 
 I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to formally request leave from July 6th to July 7th, totaling 2 days.  
 
   The reason for this leave is a planned family vacation. I have ensured that all my current tasks are up-to-date, and I am happy to assist in any way to ensure a smooth workflow during my absence. 
 
  In my absence, Alekhya/Kishore has agreed to cover my responsibilities. I will also be available via email or phone for any urgent matters that may require my attention. 
 
  Thank you for considering my request. I appreciate your understanding and support. Please let me know if you need any further information or if there are any forms I need to complete. 
 
 Regards 
 Shahid
